title: F/S/T: Four of my T206 SGC 10s - SOLD
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: F/S/T: Four of my T206 SGC 10s - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Haven't had much luck selling these dupes, so I'm lowering the price and offering a 2 for 1 trade.  $15 each or take all four for $55 delivered.  

Or you can take my four SGC 10s for any two of your T206 SGC 10s/20s (provided I don't already have it).  I'm only 20% into the set, so you can probably help me out.  Open to any offer.  LMK...

Dave Brain
Dan Moeller
Barney Pelty (vertical)
Sam Strang
